## RefreshAuthInfo type

Represents refresh token authentication information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RefreshAuthInfo = {
    type: AuthType & AuthType.REFRESH;
    username: string;
    refreshToken: string;
    mfaToken: string;
};
```
**References:** [AuthType](./foundation-comms.authtype.md), [AuthType.REFRESH](./foundation-comms.authtype.md)
